name: A Lobsters Tale
description:
This is a WIP passion project of mine.

A Lobsters Tale is an adaptation of a short film I wrote a number of years ago. Due to limited time and resources, the film never went anywhere, but this little game is a way for me to tell a version of that story. 

I am very new to all of this and still learning.

Special thanks to:

Mansion Interior - Assets Pack by Jan Schneider (itch.io
GB Studio Fence Tiles by CobGoblin (itch.io)
GB Studio Open Tilesets by Elvies (itch.io)
Battle System for GB Studio 2.0 by ManuGamesDev (itch.io)
Download Retro Space! Sci-Fi Tileset by PetricakeGames - itch.io
